channel.title: SevenAtSevenLastSection
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenLastSection, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It’s Basically Cozy Season, Right? I Think So.

item.description: Staying active at any age could boost your health, mood, and longevity. Learn the truth behind exercise myths and how movement supports healthy aging.
